accept-terms-required: Please accept the Terms and Conditions.
reset-password-desc: Please enter your email address. You will receive a link to create a new password via email.
home-subtitle: A great platform to buy, sell, and rent your properties without any agent or commissions.
about-description-1: Eastleigh Real Estate has developed a platform for the Real Estate marketplace that allows buyers and sellers to easily execute a transaction on their own. The platform drives efficiency, cost transparency and control into the hands of the consumers. Eastleigh Real Estate is Real Estate Redefined.
have-a-question: Have a question? Get in touch!
have-a-question-subtitle: We are here to help. Send us a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact-success: Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you shortly.
client-testimonials-subtitle: A great platform to buy, sell, and rent properties—directly or through trusted agents, with no hidden fees.
featured-properties-subtitle: Explore our curated selection of properties, handpicked to match your needs and lifestyle.
subscribe-subtitle: Subscribe to get latest updates and information.
pre-purchase-desc: Before starting your property search, it's essential to determine your budget. Being financially prepared can help you act quickly when you find the right property.
schedule-a-showing-desc: Viewing properties in person lets you assess their condition, layout, and surroundings. Schedule a showing to explore properties that meet your needs.
submit-an-offer-desc: Once you've found the perfect property, submitting an offer is the next step. This involves proposing a price and terms that work for both you and the seller.
property-inspection-desc: A property inspection helps identify any issues before purchasing. This ensures you're aware of the property's condition before finalizing the deal. Seek professional inspection to avoid unexpected surprises.
appraisal-desc: An appraisal helps determine the property's market value, ensuring that the price you pay aligns with its worth. Consult a professional appraiser to get an accurate valuation.
closing-deal-desc: The closing process involves finalizing the paperwork, transferring ownership, and receiving the keys to your new property.
price-your-property-desc: Setting the right price is key to attracting buyers. Research similar properties in your area to ensure your pricing is competitive.
prepare-your-home-desc: First impressions matter. Clean, declutter, and make necessary repairs to present your home at its best.
list-your-property-desc: Listing your property on Eastleigh Real Estate helps you reach more buyers. Highlight key features and use high-quality photos.
schedule-showings-desc: Allow potential buyers to visit your property. Flexible scheduling can increase interest and speed up the selling process.
review-offers-desc: When offers come in, evaluate the price and terms carefully. Consider both the offer amount and the buyer's ability to close quickly.
finalize-sale-desc: Once you accept an offer, the final step is signing the paperwork, transferring ownership, and receiving payment.
subject: Subject
developed-by: Eastleigh Real Estate. Designed & Developed with ❤️ by
upload-property-image: Upload Your Property Images Here. (Min 4 images/Videos)
image-upload-info: Supports JPG, PNG and MP4 videos. Max file size : 10MB.
signed-url-error: Failed to get signed URL for the image: {fileName}. Error: {error}.
no-properties-description: We couldn't find any properties matching your search criteria. Please refine your search term and criteria then try again.
feature-subtitle: Discover a seamless process for buying, selling, or renting properties, whether directly or through trusted agents.
feature-evaluate-description: Explore property details, compare prices, and assess value to make informed decisions.
feature-agent-description: Schedule meetings with agents to discuss property options and gain insights.
feature-deal-description: Finalize negotiations and complete the property purchase or rental for a smooth transaction.
sell-subtitle: Follow these simple steps to list your property, attract buyers, and close the deal quickly.
sell-prepare-description: Clean, declutter, and make necessary repairs to ensure your property is ready for showings.
sell-list-description: List your property online with high-quality photos and highlight its best features to attract buyers.
sell-close-description: Review offers, negotiate terms, and finalize the sale by signing the paperwork and transferring ownership.
subscribe-success: Thanks for subscribing! You will receive the latest updates and information.
subscribe-error: An error occurred while subscribing. Please try again later!
address-info: Tenth Street, 1st Avenue, Eastleigh, Nairobi, Kenya
Search-address-property: Search address, property or business name
